pages.text: Hearth & Home introduces a delightful collection of new building blocks and decorative items, perfect for crafting cozy homes and breathtaking landscapes in Minecraft. $(br2)Elevate your building game with this charming and creative mod!

Key Features: $(br2)- Building Blocks & Decorations $(br)- Elevate your structures with unique blocks, adding warmth and comfort to your world. $(br2)- Creative Structures $(br)- Everything you need to build your ultimate dream home.
Find new building blocks like Hearthstone, Terracotta, and Decorative Wood. $(br2)Explore the full range of blocks and start building your cozy home today!
